name: openhue
title: Openhue
description: Control your Philips Hue lightning system from Raycast
author: thibault_pensec

commands.name: lights
commands.title: Control Lights
commands.description: View and control individual Hue lights

commands.name: setup
commands.title: Setup Hue Bridge
commands.description: Connect to your Philips Hue Bridge

preferences.name: bridgeIP
preferences.title: Bridge IP Address
preferences.description: IP address of your Hue Bridge (leave empty to auto-discover)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
